CSGO is a good game in general, I met some cheaters and toxic people but I feel like Valve is handling it with the Prime Statut and Trust Factor system.
The only big problem is the official matchmaking servers that I wish could be updated to 128 ticks.
Otherwise cool game!
I mean, it's CS GO. I'm writing a review because Steam asked me to. You probably already own the game anyway, so give it a shot.

Мне очень стыдно за то что я зашел в эту игру и провел в ней 121 час своей жизни.

-went on casual
-5 hackers on enemy team
-everyone starts speaking russian
- panik
- panik some more
-lost match
-went into competitive
-only 4 hackers this time
-no one speak russian
-suspicious
-they asked me something in an inunderstandable language
- didnt know how to respond
- they said `kick the russian`
-again panik
-they were joking
-someone is flying
-someone is walking trough walls
- panik some more for a bit
-shot someone in the head by mistake
-they wrote in all chat `ajsodbasd asidub agaahahagag`
-i get VAC banned
